page.title: 11Chipstead
page.content: The older part of Chipstead is on a hill, but below a number of roads have developed near the station, where there is also a row of shops called Chipstead Parade. The roads are of tar and concrete and they are in very good condition. There are good bright lights along the pavements. If you took a walk along the street you would see people reading their daily newspapers and walking their dogs. Nearby there is a large golf course. If people don't play golf, they might be found playing football. There are also six tennis courts in Chipstead, three of which have been built very recently.
